LanguageData.PPC.label: Pulsed Power Capacitor
LanguageData.PPC.description: A PPC stores large amounts of energy, which can be discharged in a single pulse by energy weapons
LanguageData.PPC_Blueprint.label: Pulsed Power Capacitor (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPC_Frame.label: Pulsed Power Capacitor (building)
LanguageData.PPC_Frame.description: A PPC stores large amounts of energy, which can be discharged in a single pulse by energy weapons
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole.label: Weapons Console
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole.description: A manned target acquisition computer required by all energy weapons
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole_Blueprint.label: Weapons Console (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole_Frame.label: Weapons Console (building)
LanguageData.PPCWeaponsConsole_Frame.description: A manned target acquisition computer required by all energy weapons
LanguageData.RadarDish.label: Target Acquisition System
LanguageData.RadarDish.description: The Target Acquisition System uses a combination of technologies to track land and air based targets
LanguageData.RadarDish_Blueprint.label: Target Acquisition System (blueprint)
LanguageData.RadarDish_Frame.label: Target Acquisition System (building)
LanguageData.RadarDish_Frame.description: The Target Acquisition System uses a combination of technologies to track land and air based targets
LanguageData.PPCADS.label: ADS
LanguageData.PPCADS.description: The ADS (Active Denial System) is a directed energy weapon that uses microwaves to burn groups of enemies forcing them to flee, Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.PPCADS_Blueprint.label: ADS (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCADS_Frame.label: ADS (building)
LanguageData.PPCADS_Frame.description: The ADS (Active Denial System) is a directed energy weapon that uses microwaves to burn groups of enemies forcing them to flee, Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil.label: Tesla Coil
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil.description: Delivers a large electrical discharge to anything within range. Short range. Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil_Blueprint.label: Tesla Coil (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil_Frame.label: Tesla Coil (building)
LanguageData.PPCTeslaCoil_Frame.description: Delivers a large electrical discharge to anything within range. Short range. Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.PPCHEL.label: HEL
LanguageData.PPCHEL.description: The HEL (High Energy Laser) is a weapon that uses a laser to destroy incoming airborne projectiles. Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.PPCHEL_Blueprint.label: HEL (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCHEL_Frame.label: HEL (building)
LanguageData.PPCHEL_Frame.description: The HEL (High Energy Laser) is a weapon that uses a laser to destroy incoming airborne projectiles. Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.PPCRailgun.label: Railgun
LanguageData.PPCRailgun.description: A weapon that uses a large electromagnetic pulse to launch a projectile to extreme ranges. Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.PPCRailgun_Blueprint.label: Railgun (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCRailgun_Frame.label: Railgun (building)
LanguageData.PPCRailgun_Frame.description: A weapon that uses a large electromagnetic pulse to launch a projectile to extreme ranges. Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.Artillery_PPCRailgun.label: explosive mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_PPCRailgun.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
LanguageData.Bullet_PPCRailgun.label: explosive mortar shell
LanguageData.PPCObelisk.label: Obelisk
LanguageData.PPCObelisk.description: A directed energy weapon that uses a focused laser to burn targets. Highly accurate with long range, Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.PPCObelisk_Blueprint.label: Obelisk (blueprint)
LanguageData.PPCObelisk_Frame.label: Obelisk (building)
LanguageData.PPCObelisk_Frame.description: A directed energy weapon that uses a focused laser to burn targets. Highly accurate with long range, Requires a weapons console and a PPC for power.
LanguageData.ICBMfission.label: ICBM Fission
LanguageData.ICBMfission.description: An intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) is a guided ballistic missile primarily designed for nuclear weapons delivery, this one is tipped with a fission warhead.
LanguageData.ICBMfission_Blueprint.label: ICBM Fission (blueprint)
LanguageData.ICBMfission_Frame.label: ICBM Fission (building)
LanguageData.ICBMfission_Frame.description: An intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) is a guided ballistic missile primarily designed for nuclear weapons delivery, this one is tipped with a fission warhead.
LanguageData.LaunchPad.label: Launch Pad
LanguageData.LaunchPad.description: A launch pad is an above-ground platform from which a rocket-powered missile is vertically launched.
LanguageData.LaunchPad_Blueprint.label: Launch Pad (blueprint)
LanguageData.LaunchPad_Frame.label: Launch Pad (building)
LanguageData.LaunchPad_Frame.description: A launch pad is an above-ground platform from which a rocket-powered missile is vertically launched.
LanguageData.notReal.label: notReal
